name: human_gut_metagenomic_detection
description: This pipeline uses an a screener and then an aligner to detect organisms present in a metagenomic sample

reference_sequence.description: Reference sequences can be either FASTA from known sources or identifiers from HIVE database. These must be saved as a 'genome' type in HIVE to use in this field
reference_sequence.title: Reference Sequences

sequence_reads.description: Sequences can be either FASTA from experimental sources or identifiers from HIVE database. These must be saved as a 'nuc_read' type in HIVE to use in this field
sequence_reads.title: Nucleotide Read

reference_db.description: The db is a collection of sequences that have been flagged as a genome and are indexed.
reference_db.title: Database

dna-screening.description: Arguments for the DNA_screening, HIVE CensuScope
dna-screening.title: CensuScope

alignment.description: Arguments for the alignment, HIVE Hexagon
alignment.title: HIVE-hexagon Alignment

accession_based_results.description: A list of the number of alignemnts matched to a refrence sequence in a database object
accession_based_results.title: Accession Based Results

unalignedReads.description: A sequence object of the unaligned reads from an alignment
unalignedReads.title: Unaligned Reads

hit_list.description: A list of all the alignments matched to a reference
hit_list.title: Hit List
